title: Pride Of Britain: Vanessa Feltz flaunts her 3.5 stone weight loss in a plunging lace gown
text:
She recently revealed she had lost an incredible 3.5 stone in weight.

And Vanessa Feltz continued to flaunt her sensational physique as she joined her fiancé Ben Ofoedu at the Pride Of Britain Awards on Monday evening.

The TV personality, 57, put on a busty display in the floor-length black lace gown, which was adorned with colourful floral detailing along the neckline.

Sensational: Vanessa Feltz continued to flaunt her sensational physique as she joined her fiancé Ben Ofoedu at the Pride Of Britain Awards on Monday evening

Vanessa styled her red carpet attire with a pink fur-trim shawl, which she wore slung around her shoulders as she posed for snaps with her beau, 47.

The broadcaster wore her blonde tresses in loose curls and sported a full face of glamorous make-up, including a grey smokey-eye and lashings of mascara.

She added touches of glitz to her ensemble with a pair of dazzling drop earrings, while carrying her belongings in a statement yellow and gold clutch.

Wow! The TV personality, 57, put on a busty display in the floor-length black lace gown, which was adorned with colourful floral detailing along the neckline

Ben looked equally smart in a black three-piece suit which he teamed with an open white shirt and a pair of gold hoop earrings.

Vanessa previously lauded how weight loss has made her more confident and helped her sex life - despite her fiancé Ben not having any complaints to begin with.

Vanessa has explained that she feels more confident and enjoys wearing sexy lingerie in the bedroom now that she has shed the pounds down to a size 12.

Shocking: Vanessa recently revealed she had lost an incredible 3.5 stone in weight (Vanessa pictured in 2006)

Glam: Vanessa styled her red carpet attire with a pink fur-trim shawl, which she wore slung around her shoulders as she posed for snaps with her beau, 47

'I've been able to get sexier underwear. I love a négligée - I've got some fabulous satin ones which I think are absolutely irresistible to Ben,' she told Woman Magazine.

She went on: 'He doesn't seem to have become any less keen on a bit of how's your father, put it that way. He likes a bigger woman with a big fat bum.

'Mine has almost dwindled away, so I don't think he'd have cared if I hadn't lost an ounce, but he likes the confidence.'

She also wants to loose a further half stone by the end of 2019 - insisting that it's not just about the way she looks, it's also about health.

In March, Vanessa revealed on This Morning that she had a gastric bypass in January, during surgery to have her gastric band removed, and confirmed that she has lost the weight in under three months.

Vanessa's gastric band was fitted in 2010, and she famously admitted she used to try and 'cheat' the weight-loss procedure by drinking 'chocolate custard'
